title: codingcouple
description:
Woohoo, we all made it through the hump day! 🐪

Over the last few days we were completely focused on practising TDD with Jasmine and JavaScript. It is certainly a good feeling to be super confident about every small bit of the code and not to be going mad about the “zombie mistakes”. Although there is still a long way to go, we feel very excited about drilling down deeper into the TDD/BDD concepts.⛏⚡️ #codingcouple #tdd #softwaredevelopment
